fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Imprison (Day): Choose a player to jail. Works exactly like a real Jailor.
- Execute (Night): Execute your target. Cannot be used Night 1, cannot be used two nights in a row.
- Kidnap (Night): Kidnap a target and keep them in jail the entire next day, blocking them from seeing the next day chat and stopping their use of day abilities. 3 uses

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Other Unseen members will see the jailed target's messages.
- Your kills will appear as a Jailor kill.
- You keep priority over other jailing type roles. This includes ones on your own team, but have you tried coordinating?
